title: Our list of 5 laptops for coders stepping into 2026
snippet: Looking for a coding laptop for 2026? Explore five reliable options that balance performance, battery life and developer friendly features for modern programming workflows.

title: Why Apple Watch users tend to stick with fitness routines longer, explains study
snippet: Apple Watch data from a long-term study suggests users are more likely to maintain increased exercise levels beyond mid-January, challenging assumptions around early New Year fitness drop-offs.

title: Apple may introduce budget MacBook with A18 Pro chip in 2026: Report
snippet: Apple is reportedly planning a new affordable MacBook for spring 2026, featuring a 12.9-inch display and an A18 Pro chip. Aimed at entry-level buyers, it could offer competitive pricing while sitting below the MacBook Air in Apple’s lineup.

title: Apple’s 2nm A20 chip may push iPhone 18 prices higher in 2026: Report
snippet: Apple’s 2026 iPhones could become more expensive as the company moves to a 2nm A20 chip. Rising TSMC wafer prices may significantly increase processor costs, reportedly forcing Apple to choose between lower margins or higher iPhone 18 prices.

title: Instagram head Adam Mosseri on AI challenge: ‘Authenticity will matter more than ever’
snippet: Instagram chief Adam Mosseri warns that rapidly advancing AI-generated images and videos could blur the line between real and synthetic content, forcing the platform to rethink trust, authenticity and how original content is identified and valued in the years ahead.

title: 6 Powerful prompts to make Gemini Nano Banana Pro your video editing assistant
snippet: An AI expert explains how Google Gemini can act as a powerful video editing assistant, sharing six practical prompts that help creators plan edits, improve storytelling, optimise settings and deliver polished videos faster using AI. Here are all the prompts for you to try.

title: Planning a premium upgrade, these smartwatches with metal build caught my eye
snippet: Metal-build smartwatches combine durability with refined design, offering reliable performance, health tracking and a premium feel for everyday wear.

title: Realme 16 Pro to launch in India on Jan 6 with 200MP camera and Dimensity 7300-Max chip: Everything we know so far
snippet: Realme is set to launch the Realme 16 Pro in India on January 6, 2026. The smartphone features a 200MP LumaColor camera, a 7000mAh battery, 1.5K 144Hz AMOLED display, Dimensity 7300-Max chipset and Realme UI 7.0. Here's all we know so far.

title: Pro-startups, not pro-exploitation: Rajya Sabha MP Raghav Chadha reacts to Eternal CEO remarks
snippet: Chadha’s post on X followed Eternal CEO Deepinder Goyal’s statements defending the gig model by citing rising earnings and flexible work patterns. He emphasised that labour protections are necessary.

title: Uber rewrites driver contracts to limit impact of UK taxi tax: Report
snippet: Under the revamped driver contracts outside London, Uber will act as an agent and not the ride supplier, sharply reducing its VAT exposure under the UK’s new “taxi tax.” As a result, the Treasury may not be able to mop up the projected £700 million annual tax, even as Uber will not need to hike fare

title: OpenAI seeks 15 candidates for Grove AI talent programme
snippet: The AI giant has not specified any restrictions on background, discipline, or experience level for the prospective candidates. The five-week programme will be hosted at OpenAI’s headquarters in San Francisco and will include workshops, weekly office hours, and mentorship from its technical leaders.

snippet: Across the United States, communities are increasingly blocking massive data center projects planned by Big Tech to power AI and cloud computing. title: Delhi govt agrees in principle to allow privately-owned EVs to operate as shared taxis
snippet: The Delhi government has agreed in principle to allow privately-owned electric vehicles to operate as shared taxis, even as cab aggregators have said they will roll out shared rides that will also involve women drivers within a month, officials said on Friday.

title: Sprawling CES gadgetfest a world stage for AI and its hype
snippet: At CES, lofty artificial intelligence hype meets reality: today’s AI excels at narrow tasks, not autonomy. Analysts from Forrester warn of widening gaps, amid smart gadgets, chip rivalries, rising costs, and geopolitical trade pressures shaping consumer tech this year globally.

title: President Trump orders divestment in $2.9 million chips deal to protect US security interests
snippet: President Donald Trump on Friday ordered the unravelling of a $2.9 million computer chips deal that he concluded threatened US security interests if the current owner, HieFo Corp, remained in control of the technology.
